Supplement #6. 1st quarter. 1957 offering - 5
The Search for Truth and Unity (continued)
Program 3 - Issue 10
Reel 1:
OPEN: The Search for Truth and Unity.
CLOSE; ”...and never to degrade one’s person.”
Reel 2:
OPEN: ”His educational credo is...”
CLOSE: This is the NAEB Radio Network.
Program 4 - Issue 11
Reel 1:
OPEN: The Search for Truth and Unity.
CLOSE: ”.,.but to get out of the way.”
Reel 2:
OPEN: ”0r, and this seems to be very unjust...”
CLOSE: This is the NAEB Radio Network.
Program 5 - Issue 12
Reel 1:
OPEN: The Search for Truth and Unity.
CLOSE: ”...entered the community of this school.”
Reel 2:
OPEN: ”And they had even other concepts...”
CLOSE: This is the NAEB Radio Network.
Program 6 - Issue 13
Reel lx
OPEN: The Search for Truth and Unity
CLOSE: ”..had recourse to coercion and instituted the Inquisition.”
Reel 2:
OPEN: ”It was the urge to maintain unity...”
CLOSE: This is the NAEB Radio Network.
